subtitle: Hello, I'm Jeffrey Mishlove. It is with
great pleasure today that I announce
the formation of the NTA
Psi Experience Community. That is a
group that I have just created on
Facebook. NTA (for New Thinking Allowed)
Psi (P S I) Experience Community. Now, this is a
development that I've been hinting at
for a while: the establishment of an
online community for people who wish to
cultivate psi, who wish to enhance or it
further explore, their psi abilities. The
group is basically predicated upon one
simple ground rule, and that is always
treat all the other participants with
love and respect at all times. So, there
will be no trolling, no nastiness on this
group. And, of course, to be admitted to
the group, if you go to Facebook and
you search for “NTA Psi Experience
Community" it should come up.
It is a private group, or what they call
a "closed group", which means that only
members are able to see the
conversations that take place on this
group. And in order to become a member,
you need to be approved by a moderator
or an administrator. Right now, there are
only 2 members of the group: me and my
cousin, Sherry, who I have alluded to in
the past. If you watched the very early
episode about Uncle Harry - my Great Uncle
Harry - and a very powerful psychic dream
I had of Uncle Harry at the time of his
death. Well, apparently, in uncle Harry's
branch of the family there's a lot of
that kind of experience. and Uncle
Harry's granddaughter is my cousin
Sherry and she has
a wealth of experience related to
visitations from the deceased in her
dreams. And she will be serving as a
moderator on this community. And I'm
looking forward to a number of people,
with pronounced psychic gifts,
participating in the community. I'm not
sure how active I will be on it because
I'm mostly producing these videos. But
I'll be there. And I would say this, if
you're interested in becoming part of
this community, you're going to be asked
to answer a simple question in about
250 characters, which is “Why do you want to?”
And we're looking for people, of
course, who feel that they have a
proclivity, a talent or a gift for
psychic functioning and they want to
explore it further. This is not strictly
a remote viewing group. It's not an
astral travel group. It's not a
near-death experience group. It's not a
psychic readers group. But it's, in effect,
it's all of those things because I
expect that the participants in the
group are going to have a wide variety
of talents and interests in the
paranormal. And the point of the group is
to be a mutual support system for
everybody. And I think what you'll find
is that there will be many teachers
available in a group like this. And the
teachers will all be learning from each
other. There are really no restrictions -
that is to say if if you're just curious
but you don't feel you're particularly
talented but you're sincere in your
interest to explore your own
parapsychological capabilities, why not?
Nobody is going to deny you membership,
at least not initially. However, if you
behave rudely towards people in the
group, well, you'll probably be removed
from the group because this is a support
group. This is not a tear-down group. And I
expect that you'll find a lot of
interesting people who will be happy and
willing to help you along in your
journey. And, of course, all of these
videos that I have been creating of
which there are now hundreds uploaded on
the YouTube channel will be a resource
for this group. Another point I'd like to
make about it is, I see this as a long-
term endeavor. An online community like
this can be very useful and very
supportive. It will be non-dogmatic. But
this is not going to be a weekend
workshop kind of program, or a 10-week
training course. This is a group for
people who want to participate over the
long run, with a supportive community. And
I can also say that I'm hopeful, and I
expect that there will be opportunities
for people who develop particular
talents, to apply those talents. I think
that some of you will find that you may
have a gift in the area of financial
forecasting. Others of you may find that
you have a talent for working on those
very, very difficult cases that come up
for the police - unsolved murders, for
example. It takes a very special kind of
person to be willing to use their
God-given gift for clairvoyance to help
solve a murder case. And it's been done.
But there are many other possibilities.
You know, the application of psychic
functioning could be finding new medical
treatments. It could be developing new
inventions. It could be working with
archaeologists and finding buried
archaeological sites,
or buried oil and minerals, or buried
treasures. I don't know.
It will depend on everybody. I should
think that a big interest of the list
will be healing. A big interest on the
list will be working through the
psychological issues that we all have
around integrating psychic functioning
into our lives. You know I did an
interview with Vernon Neppe, the
neuropsychiatrist who did a very
significant study in which he looked at
people's subjective paranormal
experiences and he also correlated those
with the various activity of the brain.
And what he found is is that people who
experience lots of paranormal
experiences also reported symptoms of
what could be called temporal lobe
volatility. Temporal lobe volatility: that
is the temporal lobes of the brain are
more active. Now that can lead to seizure
activity for some people, but also
many different altered states of
consciousness. You know psychic
functioning means that you're not
operating on the same day-to-day routine
of what most people would call normal,
everyday consciousness. it's actually a
kind of trance state, if if you ask me.
But it also means this: that people who
have pronounced psychic gifts very often
develop those gifts as a response to
early childhood trauma. And so I remember
the days when I used to hang out with
people from the Berkley Psychic
Institute. And the head of that school,
Lewis Bostwick, referred to sick
psychics - I think he
sometimes called them “psych-icks.” And the point
is simply that people who have these
gifts, as I mentioned, suffer from early
childhood trauma, means they've got
issues to resolve. Opening up those
psychic doorways in the mind was
a coping strategy for children, and it
did open up a gift but it also means
there's been an emotional wound. And so,
part of the support group will be to
help people work through those issues as
well. So, we're talking about emotional
healing for the individuals. We're
talking about exploration of a range of
talents. We're talking about
opportunities for practical application.
But, most importantly, I think, is that
those of you who decide to participate
in this program will be part of a long-
term support community aimed at
increasing your psychic and spiritual
evolution. So, I hope some of you will
seriously consider participating in this
new Facebook group: the NTA Psi
Experience community. Thank you for
being with me.
you
